Package authorReco.reco

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorConfigurationFile
    Abstract AuthorConfigurationFile: class representing a configuration file indicating the file paths of the author language models.
    AuthorRecognizer1
    Class AuthorRecognizer1: a first author recognition system that recognizes the author of a sentence by using the language models read from a configuration system.
    AuthorRecognizerAbstractClass
    Abstract class AuthorRecognizerAbstractClass: abstract class that every author recognition system has to extend.
    BaselineAuthorRecognizer
    Class BaselineAuthorRecognizer: a baseline author recognition system that "recognizes" the author of a sentence by randomly choosing one author recognized by the recognition system.
    CreateLanguageModels
    Class CreateLanguageModels: a class to create the language models used in the recognition systems.
    UnknownAuthorRecognizer1
    Class UnknownAuthorRecognizer1: a first author recognition system that recognizes the author of a sentence by using the language models read from a configuration system.
